price: La trompeta será inevitablemente soplada. Ese es un día prometido.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
